name: Command Phase
description: Players generate command points and resolve abilities that activate during this phase.

name: Movement Phase
description: Players move their units across the battlefield, adhering to movement restrictions and terrain rules.

name: Psychic Phase
description: Psyker units cast psychic powers to influence the battlefield, using dice rolls to determine success.

name: Shooting Phase
description: Units use ranged weapons to attack enemy models within line of sight and range.

name: Charge Phase
description: Players declare charges and attempt to engage enemy units in close combat.

name: Fight Phase
description: Units engage in melee combat, resolving attacks in an alternating sequence.

name: Morale Phase
description: Players test the morale of their units to determine if models flee due to losses.
